content: with b row 217-218 row 259-260 row 287-288 with c with d with a row 219-224 row 261-268 row 289-304 with a with b bobble loosely row 225-226 row 269-270 step no 2 finishing weave in ends block as desired attach optional fringe as desired sample shown each fringe is cut at 23 and 3 strands held together step no 3 care hand wash or dry clean wash in tepid water using a mild soap do not twist shape and dry flat on a towel store folded do not hang abbreviations co cast on wyif with yarn in front k knit * repeat the directions p purl between the asterisks as many times as indicated repeat repeat sl slip st s stitch es p o box 88 minneapolis mn 55011 usa blueskyfibers com ©2023 this knit pattern is copyrighted material and under the copyright laws of the united states you may use this pattern for your own personal use or enjoyment but may not edit publish copy or commercially exploit this pattern in any way 02012023 p 05
